mapper.sql: spbd.product_bom_det_id, spbd.product_bom_id, spbd.material_id, spbd.dispatch_type, spbd.issue_method, spbd.loss_rate, spbd.transfer_qty, spbd.sub_material_id, spbd.process_id, spbd.usage_qty, spbd.base_qty, spbd.position, spbd.status, spbd.remark, spbd.org_id, spbd.create_user_id, spbd.create_time, spbd.modified_user_id, spbd.modified_time, spbd.is_delete, spbd.option1, spbd.option2, spbd.option3, spbd.if_have_lower_level
mapper.select: select , sm.material_code as material_code,sm.material_name as material_name,sm.material_version as material_version, sm.material_desc as material_desc,sp.process_name as process_name ,sp.process_code as process_code, sp.process_desc as process_desc , m.material_code as sub_material_code,m.material_name as sub_material_name,m.material_version as sub_material_version,m.material_desc as sub_material_desc, u.user_name as create_user_name,s.user_name as modified_user_name,bo.organization_name from base_product_bom_det spbd left join base_material sm on spbd.material_id=sm.material_id left join base_material m on spbd.sub_material_id=m.material_id left join base_process sp on spbd.process_id=sp.process_id left join sys_user u on spbd.create_user_id=u.user_id left join sys_user s on spbd.modified_user_id=s.user_id left join base_organization bo on spbd.org_id = bo.organization_id left join base_process bp on spbd.process_id = bp.process_id where spbd.product_bom_id = #{productBomId}
